name: We've Got Nothing
description:
Made for the Ludum Dare 45 Jam.

Made by Chris Prendergast & Dan Horne

Just two guys havin' fun. Enjoy.

The game follows our thought process in coming up an answer to this Dare's theme... realising we had nothing better to think of, we made it about not having anything better to think of.

If playing on web, full-screen is highly recommended, as is sound!

WASD to move, left click to shoot when able. Right click to shield when playing the final character.
